dcterms:creator: Joshua D. Angrist
dcterms:description: A dataset used to analyze the causal effects of military service on log wages, utilizing the draft eligibility instrument.
dcterms:title: 1984 Survey of Income and Program Participation (SIPP)

dcterms:creator: David Card
dcterms:description: A dataset used to estimate the causal effects of education on wages, using geographic variation in college proximity as an instrument.
dcterms:title: National Longitudinal Survey of Young Men (NLSYM)

dcterms:creator: Joshua D. Angrist
William N. Evans
dcterms:description: A dataset used to analyze the relationship between family size and labor supply, focusing on the effects of childbearing.
dcterms:title: 1980 US Census
